attributes.action: ban wearing of  I.S. 'beheading'  masks in public in the U.K.
attributes.additional_details:
Recently we have seen images on TV of jihadists beheading people whilst wearing black masks (also known as so-called rapist masks).

 Last week (mid Nov 2014) we saw some students wearing them in a violent demo in London.

It must be made illegal to wear these masks in public.

Police officers must ask people to remove their masks.  Those that don't comply should be arrested and  and then Tasered if  they refuse, on the basis that they may be terrorists and the public will be seriously alarmed otherwise.

Also, an offence to sell or own or be in possession of the same.
